question: How many players were born after the year 1985?
query: SELECT COUNT(Player_Id) FROM Player WHERE SUBSTR(DOB, 1, 4) > 1985

question: How many matches were there in May, 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` WHERE SUBSTR(Match_Date, 1, 4) = '2008' AND SUBSTR(Match_Date, 7, 1) = '5'

question: For how many times has player no.41 won the "man of the match" award?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` WHERE Man_of_the_Match = 41

question: Please list the IDs of all the matches in the year 2008.
query: SELECT Match_Id FROM `Match` WHERE SUBSTR(Match_Date, 1, 4) = '2008'

question: How many players are from Australia?
query: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'Australia' THEN T1.Player_Id ELSE NULL END) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_Id

question: Which country is the oldest player from?
query: SELECT T1.Country_Name FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Country_Name = T1.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T2.DOB LIMIT 1

question: What is the bowling skill of SC Ganguly?
query: SELECT T1.Bowling_Skill FROM Bowling_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Bowling_skill = T1.Bowling_Id WHERE T2.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: Among the players who use the right hand as their batting hand, how many of them were born after 1985?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T1.DOB, 1, 4) > 1985 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id WHERE T2.Batting_Hand = 'Right-hand bat'

question: Please list the names of the players who use the right hand as their batting hand and are from Australia.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Country_Name = T1.Country_id INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T3 ON T2.Batting_hand = T3.Batting_Id WHERE T1.Country_Name = 'Australia' AND T3.Batting_Hand = 'Right-hand bat'

question: Please list the bowling skills of all the players from Australia.
query: SELECT T2.Bowling_Skill FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Bowling_Style AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_skill = T2.Bowling_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T1.Country_Name = T3.Country_Id WHERE T3.Country_Name = 'Australia' GROUP BY T2.Bowling_Skill

question: Among the players whose bowling skill is "Legbreak", when was the oldest one of them born?
query: SELECT MIN(T1.DOB) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Bowling_Style AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_skill = T2.Bowling_Id WHERE T2.Bowling_Skill = 'Legbreak'

question: What is the bowling skill used by most players?
query: SELECT T1.Bowling_Skill FROM Bowling_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Bowling_skill = T1.Bowling_Id GROUP BY T1.Bowling_Skill ORDER BY COUNT(T1.Bowling_Skill) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of the player who won the "man of the match" award in the match on 2008/4/18?
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Man_of_the_Match WHERE T1.Match_Date = '2008-04-18'

question: For how many times has SC Ganguly played as team captain in a match?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T3.Role_Desc = 'Captain' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T2.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: What is the role of SC Ganguly in the match on 2008/4/18?
query: SELECT T2.Role_Id FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T2.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T4 ON T2.Match_Id = T4.Match_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly' AND T4.Match_Date = '2008-04-18'

question: Among all the matches SC Ganguly has played in, what is the highest winning margin?
query: SELECT MAX(T3.Win_Margin) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: What is the average winning margin of all the matches SC Ganguly has played in?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T3.Win_Margin) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: Among all the players born after the year 1985, what is the percentage of the players who use the right hand as their batting hand?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Batting_Hand = 'Right-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id WHERE SUBSTR(T1.DOB, 1, 4) > 1985

question: Give the name of the youngest player.
query: SELECT Player_Name FROM Player ORDER BY DOB DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many times has Sunrisers Hyderabad been the toss winner of a game?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Toss_Winner = ( SELECT Team_Id FROM Team WHERE Team_Name = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match`

question: Give the name of the striker in the match no. 419169, over no.3, ball no.2, inning no.2.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Ball_by_Ball AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Striker = T2.Player_Id WHERE T1.Match_Id = 419169 AND T1.Over_Id = 3 AND T1.Ball_Id = 2 AND T1.Innings_No = 2

question: Give the name of venue for the game with a win margin of 138 points.
query: SELECT T2.Venue_Name FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T1.Win_Margin = 138

question: For the game on 2008/5/12, who was the man of the match?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match WHERE T2.Match_Date = '2008-05-12'

question: State the name of captain keeper of the match no.419117.
query: SELECT T3.Player_Name FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Rolee AS T2 ON T1.Role_Id = T2.Role_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T1.Player_Id = T3.Player_Id WHERE T1.Match_Id = '419117' AND T2.Role_Desc = 'CaptainKeeper'

question: Who was the man of the series in 2013? Give the full name.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Player_Id WHERE T1.Season_Year = 2013

question: Give the date of birth of the 2014 Orange Cap winner.
query: SELECT T2.DOB FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Player_Id WHERE T1.Season_Year = 2014 AND T1.Orange_Cap IS NOT NULL

question: What is the nationality of the 7th season Purple Cap winner?
query: SELECT T3.Country_Name FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Name = T3.Country_Id WHERE T1.Season_Id = 7 AND T1.Purple_Cap IS NOT NULL

question: Which country does Ranchi city belong to?
query: SELECT T2.Country_Name FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Id = T2.Country_Id WHERE T1.City_Name = 'Ranchi'

question: How many Indian cities are there in the database?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'India' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Id = T2.Country_Id

question: State the name of the city with the most venues.
query: SELECT T1.City_Name FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.City_Id = T2.City_Id GROUP BY T1.City_Id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.Venue_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the batting hand of MK Pandey?
query: SELECT T2.Batting_hand FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'MK Pandey'

question: In the database, how many times is the number of Indian cities to the South African cities?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'India' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'South Africa' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Id = T2.Country_Id

question: How many times does M Chinnaswamy Stadium host games than Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Venue_Name = 'M Chinnaswamy Stadium' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Venue_Name = 'Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id

question: Who is the oldest player?
query: SELECT Player_Name FROM Player ORDER BY DOB ASC LIMIT 1

question: How many matches were played on May 2008?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(Match_Date, 7, 1) = '5' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` WHERE SUBSTR(Match_Date, 1, 4) = '2008'

question: How many players were born in the 90s?
query: SELECT COUNT(Player_Id) AS cnt FROM Player WHERE DOB BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31'

question: How many matches did Team 10 play in 2012?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Team_1 = 10 OR Team_2 = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` WHERE SUBSTR(Match_Date, 1, 4) = '2012'

question: List the id of the player who won the Orange Cap for 2 consecutive seasons.
query: SELECT Orange_Cap FROM Season GROUP BY Orange_Cap HAVING COUNT(Season_Year) > 1

question: How many matches were played in Season 7?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` WHERE Season_Id = 7

question: How many umpires are from South Africa?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Country_Name = 'South Africa' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Umpire AS T2 ON T1.Country_ID = T2.Umpire_Country

question: What is the name of the player with the highest number of outstanding player awards in a particular match?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match GROUP BY T2.Man_of_the_Match ORDER BY COUNT(T2.Man_of_the_Match) DESC LIMIT 1

question: In which country do the majority of the players are from?
query: SELECT T1.Country_Name FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Country_Id = T2.Country_Name GROUP BY T2.Country_Name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.Country_Name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many Orange Cap awards were won by CH Gayle?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Player_Name = 'CH Gayle' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cnt FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Season AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Orange_Cap

question: Which season played the highest number of matches at M Chinnaswamy Stadium?
query: SELECT T1.Season_Id FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T2.Venue_Name = 'M Chinnaswamy Stadium' GROUP BY T1.Season_Id ORDER BY COUNT(T1.Season_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of the team that won the most number of matches in season 1?
query: SELECT Team_Name FROM Team WHERE Team_Id = ( SELECT Match_Winner FROM `Match` WHERE season_Id = 1 GROUP BY Match_Winner ORDER BY COUNT(Match_Winner) DESC LIMIT 1 )

question: Which venue did Kolkata Knight Riders play most of their matches as a Team 1?
query: SELECT T3.Venue_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T3 ON T2.Venue_Id = T3.Venue_Id WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Kolkata Knight Riders' GROUP BY T3.Venue_Id ORDER BY COUNT(T3.Venue_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which team has the highest number of losses of all time?
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(Team_1) AS a, Team_1 FROM Match WHERE Team_1 <> Match_Winner GROUP BY Team_1 UNION SELECT COUNT(Team_2) AS a, Team_2 FROM Match WHERE Team_2 <> Match_Winner GROUP BY Team_2 ORDER BY a DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_1

question: Who is the player who won the first ever "man of the match" award?
query: SELECT Player_Name FROM Player WHERE Player_Id = ( SELECT Man_of_the_Match FROM `Match` ORDER BY match_date ASC LIMIT 1 )

question: When did Chennai Super Kings play its first match?
query: SELECT Match_Date FROM `Match` WHERE team_1 = ( SELECT Team_Id FROM Team WHERE Team_Name = 'Chennai Super Kings' ) OR Team_2 = ( SELECT Team_Id FROM Team WHERE Team_Name = 'Chennai Super Kings' ) ORDER BY Match_Date ASC LIMIT 1

question: How many players with left-hand batting style are from India?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Batting_hand = 'Left-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cnt FROM Batting_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Batting_Id = T2.Batting_hand INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Name = T3.Country_Id WHERE T3.Country_Name = 'India'

question: Who is the player that has the highest number of roles as a captain for Deccan Chargers?
query: SELECT T4.Player_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_id = T2.Team_id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T2.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T4 ON T2.Player_Id = T4.Player_Id WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Deccan Chargers' AND T1.Team_Id = 8 AND T3.Role_Desc = 'Captain' AND T3.Role_Id = 1 GROUP BY T4.Player_Id ORDER BY COUNT(T3.Role_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the percentage of all right-handed batting players among all the other players?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Batting_hand = 'Right-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.Player_Id) FROM Batting_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Batting_hand = T1.Batting_Id

question: Name the player who is born on July 7, 1981.
query: SELECT Player_name FROM Player WHERE DOB = '1981-07-07'

question: How many matches were played by the player with player ID 2?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Player_Id = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player_Match

question: List the first team's name in the match with the highest winning margin.
query: SELECT T2.Team_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_1 ORDER BY T1.Win_Margin DESC LIMIT 1

question: Give the country where St. George's Park is located.
query: SELECT T3.Country_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T2.City_Id = T1.City_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T3.Country_Id = T2.Country_id WHERE T1.Venue_Name = 'St George''s Park'

question: List the player's name of Mumbai Indians in the match ID 335990.
query: SELECT T3.Team_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T3.Team_Id = T2.Team_Id WHERE T2.Match_Id = 335990 AND T3.Team_Name = 'Mumbai Indians' GROUP BY T3.Team_Name

question: Provide the winning team's name in the match with the point of winning margin of 7 on May 7, 2009.
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Match_Winner WHERE T2.Match_Date = '2009-05-07' AND T2.Win_Margin = 7

question: How many of the matches are Superover?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Outcome_Type = 'Superover' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Outcome AS T2 ON T2.Outcome_Id = T1.Outcome_type

question: List the cities located in U.A.E.
query: SELECT T1.City_Name FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T2.Country_Id = T1.Country_id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'U.A.E'

question: What is the total number of won matches of the team named "Pune Warriors"?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Team_Name = 'Pune Warriors' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Match_Winner

question: Among the matches held in 2015, who is the winning team in the match ID 829768?
query: SELECT T2.Team_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Match_Winner WHERE T1.Match_Date LIKE '2015%' AND T1.Match_Id = 829768

question: What is the role of K Goel in the match ID 335992?
query: SELECT T3.Role_Desc FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T3.Role_Id = T2.Role_Id WHERE T2.Match_Id = 335992 AND T1.Player_Name = 'K Goel'

question: How many cities are located in South Africa?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'South Africa' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T2.Country_Id = T1.Country_id

question: How many matches were held at the venue named "Newlands"?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Venue_Name = 'Newlands' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T2.Venue_Id = T1.Venue_Id

question: Provide the point of the winning margin in a match between Mumbai Indians and Royal Challengers Bangalore on May 28, 2008.
query: SELECT T1.Win_Margin FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_1 INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T3.Team_Id = T1.Team_2 WHERE (T2.Team_Name = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T3.Team_Name = 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' AND T1.Match_Date = '2008-05-28') OR (T2.Team_Name = 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' AND T3.Team_Name = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T1.Match_Date = '2008-05-28')

question: List the names of the first andthe second teams that played a match with the point of the winning margin lower than the 30% of the average winning margin of the matches held in 2011.
query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN T1.Win_Margin < ( SELECT AVG(Win_Margin) * 0.3 FROM Match WHERE Match_Date LIKE '2011%' ) THEN T2.Team_Name END, CASE WHEN T1.Win_Margin < ( SELECT AVG(Win_Margin) * 0.3 FROM Match WHERE Match_Date LIKE '2011%' ) THEN T3.Team_Name END FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_1 INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T3.Team_Id = T1.Team_2 WHERE T1.Match_Date LIKE '2011%'

question: Among the players born in 1977, what is the percentage of the players with a role as a captain?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Role_Desc = 'Captain' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Role_Id) FROM Rolee AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T2.Role_Id = T1.Role_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T3.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id WHERE T3.DOB LIKE '1977%'

question: How many overs were there in the first innings of match ID "335996"?
query: SELECT COUNT(Over_Id) FROM Ball_by_Ball WHERE Match_Id = 335996 AND Innings_No = 1

question: List the over IDs, ball IDs, and innings numbers of the match ID "336004" while the batsman got the maximum scores.
query: SELECT Over_Id, Ball_Id, Innings_No FROM Batsman_Scored WHERE Match_Id = 336004 ORDER BY Runs_Scored DESC LIMIT 1

question: Describe any five matches IDs that reached over ID 20.
query: SELECT Match_Id FROM Ball_by_Ball WHERE Over_Id = 20 GROUP BY Match_Id LIMIT 5

question: How many players got out in the first inning of match ID "548335"?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Match_Id = 548335 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Wicket_Taken WHERE Innings_No = 1

question: List the players' names who were born in 1971.
query: SELECT Player_name FROM Player WHERE DOB LIKE '1971%'

question: Provide the match IDs which were held on 18th April 2015.
query: SELECT Match_Id FROM Match WHERE Match_Date LIKE '%2015-04-18%'

question: List the match IDs which had players out by hit wickets.
query: SELECT T1.Match_Id FROM Wicket_Taken AS T1 INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T2 ON T2.Out_Id = T1.Kind_Out WHERE T2.Out_Name = 'hit wicket'

question: How many players got out by being stumped in the second innings of all matches?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Innings_No = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Wicket_Taken AS T1 INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T2 ON T2.Out_Id = T1.Kind_Out WHERE T2.Out_Name = 'stumped'

question: How many times did Yuvraj Singh receive the Man of the Match award?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Player_Name = 'Yuvraj Singh' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Man_of_the_Match

question: Among the players who were born in 1977, provide names and birthdates of the players from England.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name, T2.DOB FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Country_Name = T1.Country_Id WHERE T2.DOB LIKE '1977%' AND T1.Country_Name = 'England'

question: Who got the Man of the Series Award in 2010?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T2.Man_of_the_Match = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T3 ON T3.Season_Id = T2.Season_Id WHERE T3.Season_Year = 2010 GROUP BY T1.Player_Name

question: Calculate the win rate of the team "Chennai Super Kings".
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Match_Winner = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Match_Id) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_1 INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T3.Team_Id = T1.Team_2 WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Chennai Super Kings' OR T3.Team_Name = 'Chennai Super Kings'

question: List the names and countries of the players from Gujarat Lions who played in the match held on 11th April 2016.
query: SELECT T4.Player_Name, T5.Country_Name FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T3.Match_Id = T1.Match_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T4 ON T4.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T5 ON T5.Country_Id = T4.Country_Name WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Gujarat Lions' AND T3.Match_Date = '2016-04-11'

question: Provide the names and birthdates of players who have left-arm fast skills.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name, T1.DOB FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Bowling_Style AS T2 ON T2.Bowling_Id = T1.Bowling_skill WHERE T2.Bowling_skill = 'Left-arm fast'

question: Where did BR Doctrove come from?
query: SELECT T1.Country_Name FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Umpire AS T2 ON T2.Umpire_Country = T1.Country_Id WHERE T2.Umpire_Name = 'BR Doctrove'

question: Who was the captain of the winning team in the match held on 1st June 2008?
query: SELECT T3.Player_Name FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T2.Match_Id = T1.Match_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T3.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T4 ON T4.Role_Id = T1.Role_Id WHERE T2.Match_Date = '2008-06-01' AND T4.Role_Desc = 'Captain' AND T2.Match_Winner = T1.Team_Id

question: Which team did CK Kapugedera belong to? How many matches did he play?
query: SELECT T3.Team_Name, COUNT(T2.Match_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T3.Team_Id = T2.Team_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'CK Kapugedera'

question: Among the matches held in Mumbai, how many percent of them were held in Wankhede Stadium?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Venue_Name = 'Wankhede Stadium' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T3.Match_Id) FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T2.City_Id = T1.City_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T3.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T1.City_Name = 'Mumbai'

question: Among the players out in match ID 392187, calculate the percentage of players out by bowl.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Out_Name = 'bowled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Player_Out) FROM Wicket_Taken AS T1 INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T2 ON T2.Out_Id = T1.Kind_Out WHERE T1.Match_Id = 392187

question: How many percent of the toss-winners decided to bowl first on the pitch from 2010 to 2016?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Toss_Name = 'field' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.Toss_Id) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Toss_Decision AS T2 ON T2.Toss_Id = T1.Toss_Decide WHERE T1.Match_Date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2016-12-31'

question: List down the ID of toss winners who decided to bat after winning the "toss of the coin".
query: SELECT Toss_Winner FROM Match WHERE Toss_Decide = 2

question: List down the match ID of matches that the "man of the match" award was given to BB McCullum.
query: SELECT T1.Match_Id FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Man_of_the_Match WHERE T2.Player_Name = 'BB McCullum'

question: List down the DOB of players who received the "man of the match" award.
query: SELECT T2.DOB FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Man_of_the_Match

question: List down the name of teams that won the toss of the coin from matches with ID from 336010 to 336020.
query: SELECT T2.Team_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Toss_Winner WHERE T1.Match_Id BETWEEN 336010 AND 336020

question: How many matches have Mumbai Indians won?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Team_Name = 'Mumbai Indians' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Match_Winner

question: List down names of teams that have played as second team against Pune Warriors.
query: SELECT T2.Team_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_2 WHERE T1.Team_1 = ( SELECT Team_Id FROM Team WHERE Team_Name = 'Pune Warriors' ) GROUP BY T2.Team_Name

question: What is the name of the team that won match ID 336000?
query: SELECT T2.Team_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Match_Winner WHERE T1.Match_Id = 336000

question: What are the match IDs that were played at Brabourne Stadium?
query: SELECT T1.Match_Id FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T2.Venue_Id = T1.Venue_Id WHERE T2.Venue_Name = 'Brabourne Stadium'

question: List down the name of venues in season 2.
query: SELECT T2.Venue_Name FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T2.Venue_Id = T1.Venue_Id WHERE T1.Season_Id = 2 GROUP BY T2.Venue_Name

question: What is the city of M Chinnaswamy Stadium?
query: SELECT T1.City_Name FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T2.City_Id = T1.City_Id WHERE T2.Venue_Name = 'M Chinnaswamy Stadium'

question: List down all of the venues in Mumbai.
query: SELECT T2.Venue_Name FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T2.City_Id = T1.City_Id WHERE T1.City_Name = 'Mumbai'

question: List down all of the winning teams' IDs that played in St George's Park.
query: SELECT T2.Match_Winner FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T1.Venue_Name LIKE 'St George%'

question: Is SuperSport Park located at Centurion?
query: SELECT T2.City_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T1.City_Id = T2.City_Id WHERE T1.Venue_Name LIKE 'St George%'

question: Calculate the total winning match for Deccan Chargers.
query: SELECT SUM(T2.Match_Winner) FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Match_Winner WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Deccan Chargers'

question: Count the total venues located in Pune City.
query: SELECT SUM(T1.Venue_Name) FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T1.City_Id = T2.City_Id WHERE T2.City_Name = 'Pune'

question: Give the player id of the player who was at the non-striker end for the most number of balls in the match 501219.
query: SELECT Ball_Id FROM Ball_by_Ball WHERE Non_Striker = Ball_Id ORDER BY Ball_Id DESC LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the average runs scored during the first half of all first innings.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN 1 < Over_Id AND Over_Id < 25 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(Runs_Scored) FROM Batsman_Scored WHERE Innings_No = 1

question: What are the average extra runs given in the second innings of every match?
query: SELECT AVG(Innings_No) FROM Extra_Runs WHERE Innings_No = 2

question: Among the matches, what percentage have a winning margin above 100?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN Win_Margin > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / TOTAL(Match_Id) FROM `Match`

question: List the name of the players born between 1970 and 1990 in descending order of age.
query: SELECT Player_Name FROM Player WHERE DOB BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1990-12-31' ORDER BY DOB DESC

question: Of the wickets taken in the third overs, how many are without the involvement of fielders?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Fielders = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Wicket_Taken WHERE Over_Id = 3

question: From which country does the most umpires are from? How many of them are from the mentioned country?
query: SELECT T2.Country_Id, COUNT(T1.Umpire_Id) FROM Umpire AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T2.Country_Id = T1.Umpire_Country GROUP BY T2.Country_Id ORDER BY COUNT(T1.Umpire_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the players, what percentage are both captain and keeper?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Role_Desc = 'CaptainKeeper' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / TOTAL(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Rolee AS T2 ON T1.Role_Id = T2.Role_Id

question: In the players, how many were out by hit wicket?
query: SELECT Player_Out FROM Wicket_Taken AS T1 INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T2 ON T1.Kind_Out = T2.Out_Id WHERE Out_Name = 'hit wicket'

question: On average, how many players from each country bat with their right hand?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Batting_hand = 'Right-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.Country_Name) FROM Batting_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Batting_id = T2.Batting_hand

question: What percentage of players have Legbreak skill?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Bowling_skill = ' Legbreak' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / TOTAL(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Bowling_Style AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_skill = T2.Bowling_Id

question: In the matches where the winning margin is less than fifty, how many teams won by wicket?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.Win_Id) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id WHERE T2.Win_Type = 'wickets' AND T1.Win_Margin < 50

question: In how many venues did team 2 win the toss and lose the match?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Team_2 = T1.Match_Winner THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T1.Team_1 = T1.Toss_Winner

question: Which player became the man of the series in the year 2012? Give the name and country of this player.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name, T3.Country_Name FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Name = T3.Country_Id WHERE T1.Season_Year = 2012

question: Give the name of the venue where the most number of matches are held.
query: SELECT T2.Venue_Name FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id GROUP BY T2.Venue_Name ORDER BY COUNT(T2.Venue_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which city hosted the least number of no-result matches?
query: SELECT T4.City_Name FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id INNER JOIN Venue AS T3 ON T1.Venue_Id = T3.Venue_Id INNER JOIN City AS T4 ON T3.City_Id = T4.City_Id WHERE T2.Win_Type = 'NO Result' GROUP BY T4.City_Id ORDER BY COUNT(T2.Win_Type) ASC LIMIT 1

question: Write the name of the player who was the man of the series more than one time.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Player_Id WHERE T1.Man_of_the_Series > 1

question: List the name and country of the players who got more than average catches in ascending order of the number of catches.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name, T4.Country_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Wicket_Taken AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Fielders INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T3 ON T2.Kind_Out = T3.Out_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T4 ON T1.Country_Name = T4.Country_Id GROUP BY T1.Player_Name ORDER BY COUNT(T3.Out_Name) ASC

question: Of the matches that were won by runs by team 1, what percentage have team 1 won the toss and decided to field?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.Team_1 = T1.Match_Winner = T1.Toss_Winner THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / TOTAL(T1.Team_1) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id INNER JOIN Toss_Decision AS T3 ON T1.Toss_Decide = T3.Toss_Id WHERE T3.Toss_Name = 'field' AND T2.Win_Type = 'runs'

question: What is the difference in the average number of players out by lbw and runout in the matches?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.Player_Out) FROM Wicket_Taken AS T1 INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T2 ON T1.Kind_Out = T2.Out_Id WHERE T2.Out_Name = 'lbw'

question: Identify by their ID all the overs in which the player with ID 7 was on strike.
query: SELECT DISTINCT Over_Id FROM Ball_by_Ball WHERE Striker = 7

question: How many first teams chose to bat after winning the toss?
query: SELECT COUNT(Team_1) FROM `Match` WHERE Team_1 = Toss_Winner AND Toss_Decide = 2

question: How many games were played in March 2010?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Match_Date LIKE '2010-03%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match`

question: How many players are older than Gurkeerat Singh player?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DOB < '1990-06-29' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player WHERE Player_Name != 'Gurkeerat Singh'

question: How many times has SR Watson been named 'Man of the Match'?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Player_Name = 'SR Watson' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Match = T2.Player_Id

question: Indicate the name of the most versatile players of the Delhi Daredevils.
query: SELECT T3.Player_Name FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T1.Player_Id = T3.Player_Id WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Delhi Daredevils' GROUP BY T3.Player_Name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.Role_Id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of the player who has been chosen the most times for 'Man of the Series'?
query: SELECT T3.Player_Name FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Man_of_the_Match INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T2.Man_of_the_Match = T3.Player_Id GROUP BY T3.Player_Name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.Man_of_the_Series) DESC LIMIT 1

question: In what year did SP Narine win the Orange Cap?
query: SELECT T4.Season_Year, T4.Orange_Cap FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T4 ON T3.Season_Id = T4.Season_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SP Narine' GROUP BY T4.Season_Year, T4.Orange_Cap

question: Which teams have had a player awarded the Purple Cap and another with the Orange Cap in the same season?
query: SELECT T5.Team_Name, T1.Orange_Cap, T1.Purple_Cap FROM Season AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Season_Id = T2.Season_Id INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T4 ON T3.Player_Id = T4.Player_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T5 ON T3.Team_Id = T5.Team_Id GROUP BY T5.Team_Name, T1.Orange_Cap, T1.Purple_Cap

question: List all Zimbabwean players.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'Zimbabwea'

question: How many players bat with their left hands?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Batting_hand = 'Left-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id

question: How many games were not won by runs?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Win_Type != 'runs' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id

question: List the name of all New Zealand umpires.
query: SELECT T1.Umpire_Name FROM Umpire AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Umpire_Country = T2.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'New Zealand'

question: In which country do most players have the 'slow left-arm chinaman' bowling style?
query: SELECT T3.Country_Name FROM Bowling_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_Id = T2.Bowling_skill INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Name = T3.Country_Id WHERE T1.Bowling_skill = 'Slow left-arm chinaman'

question: In which venue did Kochi Tuskers Kerala play most of their matches?
query: SELECT T1.Venue_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T2.Team_1 = T3.Team_Id WHERE T3.Team_Name = 'Kochi Tuskers Kerala' GROUP BY T1.Venue_Name

question: In how many games in which the batting team was the Delhi Daredevils were no runs scored?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Runs_Scored) FROM Batsman_Scored AS T1 INNER JOIN Ball_by_Ball AS T2 ON T1.Match_Id = T2.Match_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T4 ON T3.Team_1 = T4.Team_Id WHERE T2.Team_Batting = 1 OR T2.Team_Batting = 2 AND T4.Team_Name = 'Delhi Daredevils'

question: In what percentage of games played at the Dr DY Patil Sports Academy venue did the winning team win by a margin of less than 10?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.Win_Margin < 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / TOTAL(T1.Venue_Id) FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T1.Venue_Name = 'Dr DY Patil Sports Academy'

question: What is the average number of extra runs made as noballs?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.Extra_Runs) FROM Extra_Runs AS T1 INNER JOIN Extra_Type AS T2 ON T1.Extra_Type_Id = T2.Extra_Id WHERE T2.Extra_Name = 'noballs'

question: List the player's ID of the top five players, by descending order, in terms of bowling skill.
query: SELECT Player_Id FROM Player ORDER BY Bowling_skill DESC LIMIT 5

question: How many players were born before 10/16/1975, and have a bowling skill of less than 3?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Player WHERE DOB < '1975-10-16' AND Bowling_skill < 3

question: What is the name of the youngest player?
query: SELECT Player_Name FROM Player ORDER BY DOB DESC LIMIT 1

question: Tally the player IDs of "Man of the Series" awardees for the seasons from 2011 to 2015.
query: SELECT Man_of_the_Series FROM Season WHERE 2011 < Season_Year < 2015

question: What is the total number of runs scored by the batsmen during the 2nd inning of the match ID 335988?
query: SELECT SUM(Runs_Scored) FROM Batsman_Scored WHERE Match_Id = 335988 AND Innings_No = 2

question: Between match nos. 335989 and 337000, how many times did a batsman score more than 3 runs during over no. 1, ball no. 1, and inning no. 1 of the matches?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Runs_Scored > 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Batsman_Scored WHERE 335989 < Match_Id < 337000 AND Innings_No = 1 AND Over_Id = 1 AND Ball_Id = 1

question: Give me the match ID and date of the matches that were held in Kingsmead for three consecutive days.
query: SELECT T1.Match_Id, T1.Match_Date FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE T2.Venue_Name = 'Kingsmead'

question: How many times did the matches were held in MA Chidambaram Stadium from 5/9/2009 to 8/8/2011?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Venue_Name = 'MA Chidambaram Stadium' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id WHERE Match_Date BETWEEN '2009-05-09' AND '2011-08-08'

question: Where was the ID 336005 match held? Please give me the venue and the city.
query: SELECT T2.Venue_Name, T3.City_Name FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.Venue_Id = T2.Venue_Id INNER JOIN City AS T3 ON T2.City_Id = T3.City_Id WHERE T1.Match_Id = '336005'

question: Which team wins the toss during the match ID 336011, and can you tell me whether they decided to bat or field?
query: SELECT T2.Toss_Name, T1.Toss_Decide, T1.Toss_Winner FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Toss_Decision AS T2 ON T1.Toss_Decide = T2.Toss_Id WHERE T1.Match_Id = '336011'

question: Among the South African players, how many were born before 4/11/1980?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.DOB < '1980-4-11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'South Africa'

question: Write down the name of players whose bowling skill is Legbreak.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Bowling_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_Id = T2.Bowling_skill WHERE T1.Bowling_skill = 'Legbreak'

question: When and for what role did the youngest player appear in his first match?
query: SELECT T1.Match_Date, T4.Role_Desc FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Match_Id = T2.Match_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T2.Player_Id = T3.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T4 ON T2.Role_Id = T4.Role_Id ORDER BY T3.DOB DESC LIMIT 1

question: Tally the match IDs in which V Kohli is the "Man of the Match".
query: SELECT T1.Match_Id FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Man_of_the_Match = T2.Player_Id WHERE T2.Player_Name = 'V Kohli'

question: From 2011 to 2012, how many Australian players became the "Man of the Match"?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Match_Date BETWEEN '2011%' AND '2012%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T2.Player_Id = T1.Man_of_the_Match INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T3.Country_Id = T2.Country_Name WHERE T3.Country_Name = 'Australia'

question: Who among the players won both "Man of the Series" and "Orange Cap" in the same season?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Season AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Series = T2.Orange_Cap

question: When did the Sunrisers Hyderabad win their first match?
query: SELECT T1.Match_Date FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T1.Match_Winner = T2.Team_Id WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'

question: Write down the player names and IDs of the English umpires.
query: SELECT T1.Umpire_Name, T1.Umpire_Id FROM Umpire AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Umpire_Country = T2.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'England'

question: Calculate the run rate at the end of 17 overs of the match ID 335987 on 4/18/2008.
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.Toss_Name = 'bat' THEN T3.Runs_Scored ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Toss_Name = 'field' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Toss_Decision AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Toss_Id = T2.Toss_Decide INNER JOIN Batsman_Scored AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id WHERE T2.Match_Id = 335987 AND T2.Match_Date = '2008-04-18' GROUP BY T3.Over_Id HAVING COUNT(T1.Toss_Name = 'field') = 17

question: Compute the run rate at the end of 16 overs of the match ID 335999. Please include the name of the "Man of_the Match".
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.Toss_Name = 'bat' THEN T3.Runs_Scored ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Toss_Name = 'field' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Toss_Decision AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Toss_Id = T2.Toss_Decide INNER JOIN Batsman_Scored AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id WHERE T2.Match_Id = 335987 AND T2.Match_Date = '2008-04-18' GROUP BY T3.Over_Id HAVING COUNT(T1.Toss_Name = 'field') = 16

question: What is the id of the team with the highest number of matches won?
query: SELECT Match_Id FROM `Match` ORDER BY Match_Winner DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which year do the majority of the players were born?
query: SELECT DOB FROM Player GROUP BY DOB ORDER BY COUNT(DOB) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the date of the match that has the highest wager on the final result of a game?
query: SELECT Match_Date FROM `Match` ORDER BY Win_Margin DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which season has the fewest number of matches?
query: SELECT Season_Id FROM `Match` GROUP BY Season_Id ORDER BY COUNT(Match_Id) LIMIT 1

question: How many players have won at least 5 man of the match awards?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` GROUP BY Man_of_the_Match HAVING COUNT(Match_Id) >= 5

question: Who is the player who received the man of the match award during the last match of Season 9?
query: SELECT T1.Player_name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match WHERE T2.Season_Id = 9 ORDER BY T2.Match_Date DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the name of the team that won the first ever match?
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Match_Winner WHERE T2.Season_Id = 1 ORDER BY T2.Match_Date LIMIT 1

question: How many cities are in U.A.E?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'U.A.E' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM City AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T1.Country_id = T2.Country_id

question: List the names of all the umpires from England.
query: SELECT T1.Umpire_Name FROM Umpire AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.Country_Id = T1.Umpire_Country WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'England'

question: How many players bowl in the legbreak style?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Bowling_Style AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_skill = T2.Bowling_Id WHERE T2.Bowling_skill = 'Legbreak'

question: How many matches did Rajasthan Royals play in Season 8?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Season_Id = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T1.Team_1 = T2.Team_Id OR T1.Team_2 = T2.Team_Id WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Rajasthan Royals'

question: Which country is umpire TH Wijewardene from?
query: SELECT T2.Country_Name FROM Umpire AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.Country_Id = T1.Umpire_Country WHERE T1.Umpire_Name = 'TH Wijewardene'

question: What are the names of the venues in Abu Dhabi?
query: SELECT T1.Venue_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T1.City_Id = T2.City_Id WHERE T2.City_Name = 'Abu Dhabi'

question: Which country is the youngest player from?
query: SELECT T1.Country_Name FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Country_Id = T2.Country_Name ORDER BY T2.DOB DESC LIMIT 1

question: List all the names of the winning team's players in the first match of season 1.
query: SELECT T3.Player_Name FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Match_Winner = T2.Team_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T2.Player_Id = T3.Player_Id WHERE T1.Season_Id = 1 ORDER BY T1.Match_Date LIMIT 1

question: Who is the youngest player to have won the Purple Cap?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Season AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Purple_Cap ORDER BY T2.Season_Year - SUBSTR(T1.DOB, 1, 4) LIMIT 1

question: Provide the complete name of the venue, city and country where the last match was held.
query: SELECT T1.Venue_Name, T2.City_Name, T3.Country_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T1.City_Id = T2.City_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Id = T3.Country_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T4 ON T1.Venue_Id = T4.Venue_Id ORDER BY T4.Match_Date DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many overs were there in each innings of match ID "336011"?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Innings_No = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IN1 , SUM(CASE WHEN Innings_No = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IN2 FROM Ball_by_Ball WHERE Match_Id = 336011

question: List the ball IDs, scores, and innings numbers in the over ID 20 of match ID "335988".
query: SELECT Ball_Id, Runs_Scored, Innings_No FROM Batsman_Scored WHERE Match_Id = 335988 AND Over_Id = 20

question: How many matches were held in 2011?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` WHERE Match_Date LIKE '2011%'

question: How old is Ishan Kishan in 2022?
query: SELECT 2022 - SUBSTR(DOB, 1, 4) FROM Player WHERE Player_Name = 'Ishan Kishan'

question: Calculate the win rate of the toss-winners in 2012.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN Toss_Winner = Match_Winner THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN Match_Date LIKE '2012%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match`

question: How many matches in 2009 had win margins of less than 10?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` WHERE Match_Date LIKE '2009%' AND Win_Margin < 10

question: Provide the players' names in both teams of the match that was held in June 2014.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id WHERE SUBSTR(T3.Match_Date, 1, 4) = '2014' AND SUBSTR(T3.Match_Date, 7, 1) = '6' LIMIT 2

question: How many matches did Mohammad Hafeez play?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Player_Name = 'Mohammad Hafeez' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id

question: Among the players from South Africa, provide the players' names who were born in 1984.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'South Africa' AND T1.DOB LIKE '1984%'

question: Among the" Mumbai Indians" team that played in 2009, how many percent of the matches did they win?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.Match_Winner = T2.Team_Id THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Match_Id) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T1.Team_1 = T2.Team_Id OR T1.Team_2 = T2.Team_Id WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T1.Match_Date LIKE '2009%'

question: What is the ratio of players with batting hands of left and right?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Batting_hand = 'Left-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Batting_hand = 'Right-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id

question: Who is the eldest player and where did he/she come from?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name, T2.Country_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_Id ORDER BY T1.DOB LIMIT 1

question: Which bowling skills did the players from Zimbabwea have?
query: SELECT T1.Bowling_skill FROM Bowling_Style AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_Id = T2.Bowling_skill INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Name = T3.Country_Id WHERE T3.Country_Name = 'Zimbabwea'

question: List the IDs and names of the umpires from New Zealand.
query: SELECT T1.Umpire_Id, T1.Umpire_Name FROM Umpire AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Umpire_Country = T2.Country_Id WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'New Zealand'

question: Who was the captain-keeper of Rising Pune Supergiants?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T2.Team_Id = T3.Team_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T4 ON T2.Role_Id = T4.Role_Id WHERE T3.Team_Name = 'Rising Pune Supergiants' AND T4.Role_Desc = 'CaptainKeeper' GROUP BY T1.Player_Name

question: How many matches did the Sunrisers Hyderabad team win in 2013?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Match_Date LIKE '2013%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T1.Match_Winner = T2.Team_Id WHERE T2.Team_Name = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'

question: Provide match ID which had the extra type of penalty.
query: SELECT T1.Match_Id FROM Extra_Runs AS T1 INNER JOIN Extra_Type AS T2 ON T1.Extra_Type_Id = T2.Extra_Id WHERE T2.Extra_Name = 'penalty'

question: Name the teams played in a match which resulted in a tie in 2015.
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_1 OR T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_2 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T3 ON T2.Win_Type = T3.Win_Id WHERE SUBSTR(T2.Match_Date, 1, 4) = '2015' AND T3.Win_Type = 'Tie' LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the average players out in the first innings per match. How many of them were out by the leg before wicket?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(T1.Player_Out) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.Match_Id), SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Out_Name = 'lbw' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Wicket_Taken AS T1 INNER JOIN Out_Type AS T2 ON T1.Kind_Out = T2.Out_Id WHERE T1.Innings_No = 2

question: How many matches are there in 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM `Match` WHERE Match_Date LIKE '2008%'

question: Count the matches with a total of two innings.
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM Wicket_Taken WHERE innings_no = 2

question: Which is the country of the city named "Rajkot"?
query: SELECT T1.Country_Name FROM Country AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.Country_Id = T2.Country_Id WHERE city_name = 'Rajkot'

question: How many of the matches are Superover?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T2.win_type = 'wickets' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id

question: What are the teams that played in a match with the point of winning margin of 38 on April 30, 2009?
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_1 WHERE T2.win_margin = 38 AND match_date = '2009-04-30'

question: Give the name of the team of T Kohli in the match ID 335989.
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Team_Id INNER JOIN Player AS T3 ON T2.Player_Id = T3.Player_Id WHERE T2.match_id = 335989 AND T3.player_name = 'T Kohli'

question: How many venues are located at Centurion, South Africa?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Venue_name) FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T1.City_Id = T2.City_Id INNER JOIN Country AS T3 ON T2.Country_Id = T3.Country_Id WHERE T3.country_name = 'South Africa' AND T2.city_name = 'Centurion'

question: Among the matches of Delhi Daredevils in 2014, how many won matches are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Match_Winner) FROM `Match` AS T1 INNER JOIN Team AS T2 ON T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_1 OR T2.Team_Id = T1.Team_2 WHERE T2.team_name = 'Delhi Daredevils' AND T1.Match_Date LIKE '2014%'

question: Among the matches played by Royal Challengers Bangalore, what is the match ID of the match with the highest winning margin?
query: SELECT T2.match_id FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner WHERE T1.team_name = 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' AND T2.match_date LIKE '2012%' ORDER BY T2.win_margin DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many times did K Goel played as a player only?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Match_Id) FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T1.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T2.Player_Name = 'K Goel' AND T3.Role_Id = 3

question: What is the average winning margin of the matches held in Newlands?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.win_margin) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Venue AS T2 ON T1.venue_id = T2.venue_id WHERE T2.venue_name = 'Newlands'

question: Provide the losing team's name in the match ID 336039.
query: SELECT Team_Name FROM Team WHERE Team_Id = ( SELECT CASE WHEN Team_1 = Match_Winner THEN Team_2 ELSE Team_1 END FROM Match WHERE match_id = 336039 )

question: What is the venue for the match ID 829768?
query: SELECT T1.Venue_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.venue_id = T2.venue_id WHERE T2.match_id = 829768

question: What is the second team's name in the match with the lowest winning margin?
query: SELECT T1.team_name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.team_2 ORDER BY T2.win_margin LIMIT 1

question: Among the matches in 2013, what is the percentage of winning of the team "Mumbai Indians"?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Match_Winner = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.Match_Winner) FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Match_Winner WHERE T2.Match_Date LIKE '2013%'

question: What is the difference between the number of matches where SC Ganguly played as a Captain and those matches where he played other roles?
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T3.Role_Id = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T3.Role_Id > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T1.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T2.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: How many players have the bowling skill greater than 2?
query: SELECT COUNT(Player_Name) FROM Player WHERE Bowling_skill > 2

question: How many players were born in 1970?
query: SELECT COUNT(Player_Name) FROM Player WHERE DOB LIKE '1970%'

question: How many players were born in the 80s and have bowling skill of 2?
query: SELECT COUNT(Player_Name) FROM Player WHERE DOB LIKE '198%' AND Bowling_skill = 2

question: How many matches are there in April, 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM Match WHERE Match_date LIKE '2008-04%'

question: What is the city name of country ID 3?
query: SELECT City_Name FROM City WHERE Country_ID = 3

question: How many victory matches were there in 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM Match WHERE Match_Date LIKE '2008%' AND Match_Winner IS NOT NULL

question: Provide the country ID of East London.
query: SELECT Country_id FROM City WHERE City_Name = 'East London'

question: How old is SC Ganguly in 2008?
query: SELECT 2008 - strftime('%Y', DOB) FROM Player WHERE Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: List the names of players who play by the left hand.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id WHERE T2.Batting_hand = 'Left-hand bat'

question: How many players are Indians?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'India'

question: List the name of England players.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'England'

question: What is the venue name of Bandladore?
query: SELECT T1.Venue_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN City AS T2 ON T1.City_ID = T2.City_ID WHERE T2.City_Name = 'Bangalore'

question: What are the names of players who participated in season year 2008?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T3.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T4 ON T2.Season_Id = T4.Season_Id WHERE T4.Season_Year = 2008 GROUP BY T1.Player_Name

question: What are the names of players that have run scored less than 3?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Batsman_Scored AS T3 ON T2.Match_ID = T3.Match_ID WHERE T3.Runs_Scored < 3 GROUP BY T1.Player_Name

question: What is the role of SC Ganguly?
query: SELECT T3.Role_Desc FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T2.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly' GROUP BY T3.Role_Desc

question: List the names of players who played as a keeper.
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T2.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T3.Role_Desc = 'Keeper' GROUP BY T1.Player_Name

question: What are the names of players in team 1?
query: SELECT T1.Player_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T2.Team_Id = T3.Team_Id WHERE T3.Team_Id = 1 GROUP BY T1.Player_Name

question: How many players played as a captain in season year 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Match_Id = T2.Match_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T1.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T3.Role_Desc = 'Captain' AND T2.Match_Date LIKE '2008%'

question: Which teams did SC Ganguly join in season year 2008?
query: SELECT T5.Team_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T3.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T4 ON T2.Season_Id = T4.Season_Id INNER JOIN Team AS T5 ON T3.Team_Id = T5.Team_Id WHERE T4.Season_Year = 2008 AND T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly' GROUP BY T5.Team_Name

question: What type did match ID 336000 win?
query: SELECT T2.Win_Type FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id WHERE T1.Match_Id = 336000

question: Where did SB Joshi come from?
query: SELECT T2.Country_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_ID WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SB Joshi'

question: How many players have left arm fast in bowling skill?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Bowling_Style AS T2 ON T1.Bowling_skill = T2.Bowling_Id WHERE T2.Bowling_skill = 'Left-arm fast'

question: What is the outcome type of match ID 392195?
query: SELECT T2.Outcome_Type FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Outcome AS T2 ON T1.Outcome_type = T2.Outcome_Id WHERE T1.Match_Id = '392195'

question: Who is the youngest player and which city did he/she come from?
query: SELECT T3.City_Name FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_Id INNER JOIN City AS T3 ON T2.Country_Id = T3.Country_Id ORDER BY T1.DOB LIMIT 1

question: How many matches did team Kings XI Punjab win in season year 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T2.Match_Id) FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T1.Team_Id = T3.Team_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T4 ON T2.Season_Id = T4.Season_Id WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Kings XI Punjab' AND T4.Season_Year = 2008

question: How many seasons did Pune Warriors participate in?
query: SELECT COUNT(T.Season_Year) FROM ( SELECT T4.Season_Year FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T1.Team_Id = T3.Team_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T4 ON T2.Season_Id = T4.Season_Id WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Pune Warriors' GROUP BY T4.Season_Year ) T

question: What year was R Dravid born and the role he played?
query: SELECT T1.DOB, T3.Role_Desc FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T2.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'R Dravid' GROUP BY T1.DOB, T3.Role_Desc

question: How many times did SC Ganguly be the man of the match?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.Man_of_the_Match) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T3.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id WHERE T1.Player_Name = 'SC Ganguly'

question: How many matches did team Mumbai Indians win in 2008?
query: SELECT COUNT(T.Match_Id) FROM ( SELECT T2.Match_Id FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T1.Team_Id = T3.Team_Id WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T2.Match_Date LIKE '2008%' GROUP BY T2.Match_Id ) T

question: Which team won by wickets in match ID 335993?
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T1.Team_Id = T3.Team_Id INNER JOIN Win_By AS T4 ON T2.Win_Type = T4.Win_Id WHERE T2.Match_Id = '335993' GROUP BY T1.Team_Name

question: Count the matches that were won by wickets in all season.
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.Match_Id) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id WHERE T2.Win_type = 'wickets'

question: What is the role of W Jaffer in season year 2012?
query: SELECT T4.Role_Desc FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Match AS T3 ON T2.Match_Id = T3.Match_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T4 ON T2.Role_Id = T4.Role_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T5 ON T3.Season_Id = T5.Season_Id WHERE T1.Player_name = 'W Jaffer' AND T5.Season_Year = 2012

question: What are the names of players who had been man of the match more than 5 times in season year 2008?
query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(T2.Man_of_the_Match) > 5 THEN T1.Player_Name ELSE 0 END FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Man_of_the_Match INNER JOIN Player_Match AS T3 ON T3.Player_Id = T1.Player_Id INNER JOIN Season AS T4 ON T2.Season_Id = T4.Season_Id WHERE T4.Season_Year = 2008

question: What is the average of Indian players that were born between 1975 and 1985 among all players?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Country_Name = 'India' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_ID WHERE strftime('%Y', T1.DOB) BETWEEN '1975' AND '1985'

question: Calculate the percentage of left hand batting style players among all players.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Batting_hand = 'Left-hand bat' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Player_Id) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Batting_Style AS T2 ON T1.Batting_hand = T2.Batting_Id

question: What is the percentage of matches that are won by runs?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.win_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.Win_Type) FROM Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Win_By AS T2 ON T1.Win_Type = T2.Win_Id

question: How many matches have 7 points of winning margin?
query: SELECT COUNT(Match_Id) FROM Match WHERE win_margin = 7

question: What is the total number of players born between 1970 to 1975?
query: SELECT COUNT(Player_Id) FROM Player WHERE strftime('%Y', DOB) BETWEEN '1970' AND '1975'

question: Who is the winning team in a match held on April 26, 2009 with a winning margin of 6 points?
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner WHERE T2.Win_Margin = 6 AND T2.Match_Date = '2009-04-26'

question: In the match ID 419135, who won by runs?
query: SELECT T1.Team_Name FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.team_id = T2.match_winner INNER JOIN Win_By AS T3 ON T2.win_type = T3.win_id WHERE T2.Match_Id = 419135

question: Among the matches held in St. George's Park, give the match ID of the match with the highest winning margin points.
query: SELECT T2.Match_Id FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.venue_id = T2.venue_id WHERE T1.Venue_Name = 'St George''s Park' ORDER BY T2.Win_Margin DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many of the players are from Sri Lanka?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Player AS T1 INNER JOIN Country AS T2 ON T1.Country_Name = T2.Country_ID WHERE T2.Country_Name = 'Sri Lanka'

question: List the player's name who played as a captain.
query: SELECT T2.Player_Name FROM Player_Match AS T1 INNER JOIN Player AS T2 ON T1.Player_Id = T2.Player_Id INNER JOIN Rolee AS T3 ON T1.Role_Id = T3.Role_Id WHERE T3.Role_Desc = 'Captain' GROUP BY T2.Player_Name

question: Give the match's venue and winning team for the match ID 392194.
query: SELECT T1.Venue_Name, T3.Team_Name FROM Venue AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.venue_id = T2.venue_id INNER JOIN Team AS T3 ON T2.match_winner = T3.Team_Id WHERE T2.Match_Id = 392194

question: Among the matches of Delhi Daredevils in 2009, what is the percentage of their matches won by wickets?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T3.Win_Type = 'wickets' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T3.Win_Type) FROM Team AS T1 INNER JOIN Match AS T2 ON T1.Team_Id = T2.Match_Winner INNER JOIN Win_By AS T3 ON T2.Win_Type = T3.Win_Id WHERE T1.Team_Name = 'Delhi Daredevils'
